name: Full Blonding Foil
description: This is a full blonde experience. This will be based on your natural hair color, texture, length, and your desired blonde. This is a 6 week up keep.

name: Partrial Blonding Foil
description: This is a good balance once you have achieved your desierd blonde.This is a 6 week up keep.

name: Full Foilayage
description: Think more natural and easier to maintain. This is a 8-10 week up keep.

name: Partial Foilayage
description: Think more natural with a darker base underneath. This is a 8-10 week up keep

name: Mini Blonding
description: This is focusing hair around the face and a painting technique for the ends of the hair. It is great service for combination in betweeen blonding service.This is a 6-8 week up keep.

name: Lowlight Foil
description: This is taking a darker brown color and creationg depth in the hiar. This is a 6-8 week up keep.

name: Base Color
description: This is an all over color more uniform look. This is a 6-8 weeek up keep.

name: Grey Coverage
description: This is covering regrowth to match the rest of the hair. This is a 4-6 week up keep.

name: Glaze/Gloss
description: This is a color boost. It is great for combination in between color services.It also repairs and hydrates the hair.This a 3-4 week up keep.

name: Lightener Retouch
description: This is covering regrowth with lightner to match the rest of the hiar without using foils.
